mapper.insert: insert into jdbc_board (board_no, board_title, board_writer, board_date, board_cnt, board_content) values (board_seq.nextVal, #{board_title}, #{board_writer}, sysdate, 0, #{board_content})
mapper.update: update jdbc_board set board_cnt = (board_cnt + 1) where board_no = #{board_no}
mapper.select: select * from jdbc_board order by board_no desc
select board_no, board_title, board_writer, to_char(board_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') board_date, board_cnt, board_content from jdbc_board where board_no = #{board_no}
select * from jdbc_board where board_title like '%' || #{board_title} || '%' order by board_no desc
